settings.name: Step 01
settings.subtitle: Pay Deposit
settings.text: Choose the right number of trackers for your team with a range of 20 to 40 trackers to select from. If your team requires more, simply complete the form that appears when you try to select over 40 trackers. Once you've made your selection, a £200 deposit secures your purchase.

settings.name: Step 02
settings.subtitle: Confirm Order
settings.text: After you've paid your deposit, PitcheroGPS will confirm you order by email within 24 hours.We will also confirm your vest sizes. With 8 vest size options, ranging from Youth Small to XXL, you can choose the right fit for each of your players. A size chart will be included in the email, making it easy for you to select the correct sizes for your team.

settings.name: Step 03
settings.subtitle: Create Membership
settings.text: Once you have placed your order we will send you an automated invoice to be paid by bank transfer for the cost of the Team Bundle minus your £200 deposit. This must be paid in order to receive your Team Bundle on time. Once we receive this payment, we will work with you to set-up your coaches and players on the PitcheroGPS Analysis Software.

settings.name: Step 04
settings.subtitle: Team Bundle Arrives
settings.text: Your PitcheroGPS Team Bundle will be delivered. The bundle includes the number of trackers you selected at checkout along with the same number of Player Vests. You will also receive a secure carry case for charging and data transfer.
